original_title: Gameplay: The Story of the Videogame Revolution
overview: A feature documentary on the history of video games. From 'Pong', 'Pac Man' and 'Mario' to 'Call of Duty', 'Grand Theft Auto' and everything in between it tells the story of how this industry was created, by whom and where it is headed.
title: Gameplay: The Story of the Videogame Revolution
